title: Live Love and Be Free
lyrics:
It's a message to my Son
To always be free
The truth of life is gone
In the dark you can see
May push past the tide
And always dream to dream

And in the shadows of the light

Find a way between



Live and love

Love and be free

Live and love

Love and be free



It's a message to my son (on the telephone)

To always to dream to dream

The world is yet to be seen (eyes are everywhere)

So find a way to be

May push past the trees

And drift out to sea

And in the shadows and the light

Find a way between



Live and love

Love and be free

Live and love

Love and be free
